review_description: This game is very challenging. It's one game that teaches the real-life lesson to persevere in difficult tasks and never consider 'giving up' as an option. Precisely, it teaches that 'winners don't quit, and quitters never win in any real life situations'. This is because the point at which you may be contemplating giving up could be the very point in which your next step could lead you to victory. You have to always think outside the box in order to keep winning in life.

review_description: Candy Crush has took a massive nose dive. They want you to spend but you can no longer see your Facebook friends, no longer send or receive lives and even took away the challenge of getting the plane/train tickets to get to the next level.. Worst of all are the pop ups, there's way too many. I also miss the night/owl levels that you could switch to whilst waiting for lives on the other. It just isn't the same. I'd love a Candy Crush Classic version. There's been too many unnecessary changes.

review_description: Have played Candy Crush on & off over the past 10 years. The levels themselves are still as enjoyable/irritatingly annoying (when you're struggling to pass) What I will say though, and my reason for 3 stars instead of 5 is the fact that there are far too many pop ups after you fail/pass a level. It's actually quite ridiculous to be honest. Sometimes when a level ends, I just want to go from the 'map' to the 'events' section with no drama but instead time is wasted crossing off a million pop ups.

review_description: I'll give the game a fair rating, since it's fun at first, but - and this applies to all of the Candy Crush and similar games, not just this one - you'll soon reach a point where fun turns to frustration, and I'm past that point. I'm fed up with absurdly difficult levels that are near impossible to complete without spending money, and I've had it up to my ears with being forced to participate in races, treasure hunts and other things I don't care about. Uninstalling and wasting no more time.

review_description: I am uninstalling this game after 10 years. I've reached level 4814, and after having a win streak of 80, I was cheated out of my win streak. This level needed me to drop 6 cherries to pass. Right towards the end, the 6th cherry would not release, even after paying to continue the level to have 5 extra moves, 4 times in a row. I've spent so much money on this game over the years. You're actually doing me a favour. I'm seriously disappointed, but I guess it is your loss.

review_description: For such a successful game, it sure seems mindless, overwhelming, and saccharine. I can see why some would like it, but I have a low opinion of most of them for seeking out such stupid distractions instead of something a bit more intellectually challenging or at least less... mindless. I used to be impressed by the graphics, but they seem a bit fake to me, not merely impossibly idealistic like they used to. There are better games out there that are just as distracting without being silly.

review_description: Super upset with the most recent change to limit bonus lives to 20 per day. review_description: **DO NOT PURCHASE BOOSTER OR GOLD BUNDLES** I was stupid/bored enough to purchase my first ever booster-pack-whatever last month. The bonus lives, moves and boosters functions all immediately disappeared and harder levels became next to impossible and more frequent. L4300+ and some levels can take 200+ attempts each. Frustrating, tedious and not at all enjoyable. This is a deliberate, cynical strategy to force players into pay-to-progress. In my case, it will not be successful. Uninstalling.

The lives system sucks too, let me play.

review_description: Whatever you do, do not buy items on candy crush.. its a scam. The game makes it impossible to pass certain rounds no matter how well you play, it's programmed that way so you're tempted to purchase boosters. Reality is, when the game senses you're stuck on a round for some time it will automatically give you a winning chance where any move you make will allow you to pass the round. I'm on level 4950 and I seen all the glitches and scams. Candy crush is not true to the player, do not purchase!!
